name: Whole (Aran)
description:
A short horror roguelike about trying to escape a terrifying reality. Made for the 7DRL challenge.

- WASD or arrow keys to move.

- Spacebar to wait a turn.

- Enter to pick up items.

Consume or absorb items to regain health or permanently increase your stats.

The game is pretty incomplete. There's no persistence between floors and no win state. Ran up against a number of game breaking issues right at the end. I hope to iron some of the bugs out in the near future and release an update.
